item.title: Some Concepts in Hardware Design
item.description: Concepts source: Quora A digital design consits of several HDL files that together form a so called toplevel, and modules. A design must be verified before translated into a target hardware. The toplevel design is called the RTL code (register-transfer level code) since it can be translated by a tool into a netlist (interconnection of basic cells, like flipflops and logic gates).
